title: rosetta心得
zzzContent:
1.创建文件: rosetta target create /home/y/share/htdocs/knowledge/tw/ed/ggggg2222.php 这里给出的路径必须是在 rosetta intl show settings ks 的返回信息得到的:
double_byte = N
infix = /
server_name = ks.twkplus.yahoo.com
doc_root = /home/y/share/htdocs/knowledge/tw
encoding = iso-8859-1
double_byte = N infix = / server_name = ks.twkplus.yahoo.com doc_root = /home/y/share/htdocs/knowledge/tw encoding = iso-8859-1 的路径下。
